mapper.select: select CS.classroom_id,CS.status,CC.classroom,CC.capacity,T.building,T.building_id, T.campus_id from classroom_status AS CS, edu_b_course_classroom AS CC,edu_b_teachbuilding AS T where CC.classroom_id = CS.classroom_id AND T.building_id = CC.building_id AND CS.term = #{term,jdbcType=CHAR} AND CS.week = #{week,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CS.day = #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CS.status != '111111111111' order by building asc
